Package ohos.aafwk.ability

Interface IAbilityConnection


  • public interface IAbilityConnection
    Provides callback methods that are called when a remote ability using the Service template is connected or disconnected.

    You must override the methods of this interface to implement your processing logic for the connection and disconnection of an ability using the Service template (Service ability for short).

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Aafwk#ABILITY

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAbilityConnectDone​(ElementName element, IRemoteObject remote, int resultCode)
      Called back after an ability connects to a Service ability.
      void onAbilityDisconnectDone​(ElementName element, int resultCode)
      Called back after all connections to a Service ability are disconnected.

    • Method Detail

      • onAbilityConnectDone

        void onAbilityConnectDone​(ElementName element,
                          IRemoteObject remote,
                          int resultCode)
        Called back after an ability connects to a Service ability.

        This method is called back to receive the connection result after an ability calls the Ability#connectAbility(Intent, IAbilityConnection) method to connect it to a Service ability.

        Parameters:
        element - Indicates information about the connected Service ability.
        remote - Indicates the remote proxy object of the Service ability.
        resultCode - Indicates the connection result code. The value 0 indicates a successful connection, and any other value indicates a connection failure.
        See Also:
        Ability.connectAbility(Intent, IAbilityConnection)

      • onAbilityDisconnectDone

        void onAbilityDisconnectDone​(ElementName element,
                             int resultCode)
        Called back after all connections to a Service ability are disconnected.

        This method is called back to receive the disconnection result after the connected Service ability crashes or is killed. If the Service ability exits unexpectedly, all its connections are disconnected, and each ability previously connected to it will call onAbilityDisconnectDone(ohos.bundle.ElementName,int).

        Parameters:
        element - Indicates information about the disconnected Service ability.
        resultCode - Indicates the disconnection result code. The value 0 indicates a successful disconnection, and any other value indicates a disconnection failure.
        See Also:
        Ability.disconnectAbility(IAbilityConnection)
